column4: so i installed blender from the "irie" ppa and now i can't open it. any ideas?
also, it might be worth saying that the application filename is blender-bin+svn#####
so where do i go for the guys who handle ppas?
try running your app under strace (e.g. strace blender) to see if you get any coherent error messages about why it won't work. Warning: You'll get a LOT of messages.
